Music

Music

April 9, 2020 Venkatesh Comments 8 comments

What is music? The rhythmic combination of the three disciplines, namely-: Vocal-: The art of singing. Instrumental-: The art of playing any instrument. Dance-: The art of expression. is called music. History of music Prehistoric music-: The earliest forms of music were probably drum-based, percussion instruments being the most readily available at the time (i.e. rocks, sticks). These simplest of simple instruments are thought to have been used in religious ceremonies as representations of animals. There was no notation or…
